allOf.title: se_id
allOf.description: A string that uniquely identifies a ShipEngine resource, such as a carrier, label, shipment, etc.

warehouse_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the warehouse

created_at.description: Timestamp that indicates when the warehouse was created

allOf.title: address
allOf.description:
Any residential or business mailing address, anywhere in the world.

> **Note:** Either `name` or `company_name` must be set. Both may be specified, if relevant.

allOf.title: partial_address
allOf.description: A complete or partial mailing address.

name.description: The name of a contact person at this address.  This field may be set instead of - or in addition to - the `company_name` field.

phone.description: The phone number of a contact person at this address.  The format of this phone number varies depending on the country.

company_name.description: If this is a business address, then the company name should be specified here.

address_line1.description: The first line of the street address.  For some addresses, this may be the only line.  Other addresses may require 2 or 3 lines.

address_line2.description: The second line of the street address.  For some addresses, this line may not be needed.

address_line3.description: The third line of the street address.  For some addresses, this line may not be needed.

city_locality.description: The name of the city or locality

state_province.description: The state or province.  For some countries (including the U.S.) only abbreviations are allowed.  Other countries allow the full name or abbreviation.

address_residential_indicator.description: Indicates whether this is a residential address.

allOf.title: address_residential_indicator
allOf.description: Indicates whether an address is residential.

origin_address.description: The origin address of the warehouse

allOf.description: Indicates whether an address is residential.

return_address.description: The return address associated with the warehouse
